entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 2:00 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
